gist.headline: Fresh Ink
gist.blurb: The daily news delivery has arrived on the front page.
gist.summary: Automated update to the README.md latest news section.
gist.impact: Ensures the project landing page reflects the most recent updates.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee delivering a rolled-up newspaper to a pixel art doorstep.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot delivering a tiny rolled-up pixel newspaper to a welcome mat. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
